pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, October 13, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, October 13, 2017:

Mexico City, Mexico

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive at the Senate of the Republic and attend a welcoming ceremony.

Senate of the Republic

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver an address to the Senate of the Republic.

Senate of the Republic

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

2:50 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Gr√©goire Trudeau will depart Mexico City, Mexico for Ottawa, Canada.

Note for media:

  • Closed to media

Note: all times local
